SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: This example shows an agent with a default commission rate of 3%

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The contact ID of the marketing agent

PARAMETERS.NAME: agentID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: PUT Only, the agentID may be used in the body, in place of contactID in the path but only for PUT requests.

PARAMETERS.NAME: commissionRate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The percentage commission, between 0 and 100, that the agent will receive.

PARAMETERS.NAME: taxRuleID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The tax rule to be specified for this agent. 1 = Excluding GST, 2 = Including GST, 3 = Exempt

PARAMETERS.NAME: Custom_Field_[VariableName]
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Custom fields may be updated by specifying their variable name prefixed by custom_field_ EG: custom_field_region, custom_field_specialty. Values used should correspond to the custom field specified. Note: this will not create custom fields, they must already exist.

DESCRIPTION: This endpoint is only available for clients using the Marketing/Sales Agents feature. POST will create a marketing agent for the contact ID specified in the request. PUT will update an existing marketing agent. A 412 will be returned if any required parameters are missing or exceed allowed values. NOTE: PUT requests cannot reassign an agentID to a different contact, contactID or Agent ID will be used to locate the record, with contactID taking preference.
